lyrics.stanza: Oh, there's a place for you, my friend Where the earthly sorrows end, And the joy is flowing like a river, free; Where everyone is satisfied, As we mutually abide In the One who gave His life for you and me.
Oh, Jesus is blending us together; He is the reason why we're here. We will be one in Him forever, And we will build according to this vision clear.
